message: Our office is open from 9 AM to 6 PM, Monday through Friday. This is an automated response; for further details, please contact our support team.

Return Period Standard Items: Returns are accepted within 30 days of purchase. Electronics and Special Items: Returns must be initiated within 14 days of purchase. Condition for Returns Items must be unused, in their original packaging, and include all accessories, tags, and documentation. Items marked as Final Sale or Non-Returnable cannot be returned or exchanged. Refunds and Exchanges Refunds will be issued to the original payment method within 7-10 business days of return approval. Exchanges are subject to product availability.
You can reach us via email at peintai54@gmail.com. This is an automated reply to guide you.
